talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It’s Christmas season already.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
Which story shall I tell you today?
On a cold winter’s day, what’s more befitting than a story about Christmas?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>In a few days, <FONT color=#a82424>Mr. Santa</FONT> will bring me joy and laughter.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
Absolutely!
The sound of carols in Saint Haven sure lifts the mood.
Receiving gifts on a day like this would make me feel even merrier.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why not? I waited the entire year for this day!!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
Oh dear... Have you not heard the news yet?
Santa is in a pretty bad shape right now.
I wonder if he can deliver the presents this Christmas.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Gulp!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
It all started a few days ago.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$[Event] Naked Santa$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That doesn’t sound right. Why was he out partying when Christmas is just around the corner?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
It was a normal day like any other day.
Santa was preparing for the upcoming Christmas by partying hard until late.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I guess he was too stressed about work.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
{user_nick}, adults have their own issues.
Being overloaded with work is a huge stress.
Delivering presents all around the world in just a single day is an insane lot of work.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I see, so that’s adult’s life.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
That’s right.
So if he knows he has such tremendous amount of work to be done in the near future, he needs to party while he can.
That’s the life of working adults!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wow... Rudolph Duck’s way of going on a <FONT color=#a82424>strike</FONT> is pretty violent.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
Anyway, that’s when things started to go wrong.
The Rudolph Ducks that pull the sleigh undressed Santa and burned his clothes on a strike.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Me too! I want my present from Santa!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
Precisely.
We have no choice but to make a set of new clothes for Santa.
I don’t want to give up on my present.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We’ll put clothes on Santa again!! I’ll find <FONT color=#387206>{item:400593}</FONT> no matter what…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
Good attitude!
Even if we have to pluck Rudolph Ducks’ {item:400593}, we need to get new clothes for Santa.
Maybe Rudolph Ducks know this is coming since they are secretly hiding somewhere now, but I’ve been hearing reports that they were seen in dungeons.

$Storyteller Kathy$
I’ll leave it to you then.
Although I’m not sure which dungeon they are in, I’m sure the Rudolph Ducks are out there somewhere.
Quickly catch them and strip them of all their feathers.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Kathy! I'm back.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
Huhu……
I guess there won’t be any problem with Christmas gift delivery if Santa has new clothes.
I wonder what I’ll get this Christmas.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Here you go.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
{user_nick}! I see you’re carrying a bunch of something fluffy……

(Kathy smiles brightly)

$Storyteller Kathy$
There is not enough {item:400593} to make new clothes for Santa.

※ To proceed with the quest you need 10 {item:400593}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I pity Santa! He doesn’t have any clothes!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
Oh! You’ve collected 10 {item:400593} so soon?
Then I think we can make Santa’s clothes sooner than I expected.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#a82424>Christmas presents</FONT> should arrive on time!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
You’re right. Besides, Santa must be freezing to death without any clothes on.
If he catches a cold, gift delivery may be affected.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Receive Rewards)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Proceed with next quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
Now, all we have to do is to make the clothes.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#2b2723>Didn’t you say they were good up until now?</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
But... This won’t do...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#2b2723>Of course. It’s supposed to be white.</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
Take a look at this. Do you see these feathers?
{user_nick}, the feathers you brought are too white.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#2b2723>Why is that a problem?</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
This won’t do. This doesn’t match the standards of Santa’s clothes.
There’s something very wrong about this!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(She seems to be obsessed with the colour.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Storyteller Kathy$
Imagine Santa wearing white clothes!!!
He’s always wearing red in all the stories.

qstep_change.comment:
아이템 수집을 목표로 등록하는 경우 루돌프 솜 0/100 -- 이런식의 목표는 몬스터를 사냥하여 아이템을 드롭하는 내용이 없으면 카운트되지 않는다.
일반 아이템의 경우 치트키를 사용하면 퀘스트 목표 수량이 완료되어도 바로 갱신되지 않는다. 몬스터를 잡아 아이템을 먹으면 수량 체크가 됨. (치트 외에 정상 플레이 시 아무 문제 없다는 뜻)

journal.title: Talk to Storyteller Kathy
journal.contents:
Listen to Kathy’s story about why it’s difficult for Santa to deliver presents this Christmas.

Saint Haven - Storyteller Kathy

journal.title: Collect Rudolph Duck Down
journal.contents:
Hunt Rudolph Ducks that appear in various dungeons and collect Rudolph Duck Downs.
※ Collect 10 Rudolph Duck Downs and bring them back to Saint Haven’s Storyteller Kathy.

Dungeons - Rudolph Duck
journal.todo_msg: Hunt Rudolph Ducks that appear in dungeons.

journal.title: Talk to Storyteller Kathy
journal.contents:
Hunt Rudolph Ducks that appear in various dungeons and collect Rudolph Duck Downs.

Saint Haven - Storyteller Kathy
